parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check whether given [[Post process effects|post process effect]] is committed

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ppEffectCommitted''' effect

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> effect: [[String]] - effect name

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''ppEffectCommitted''' handle

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> handle: [[Number]] - effect handle

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ppEffectCommitted]] "colorCorrection";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[ppEffectCommitted]] _hndl;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[ppEffectCommitted]] "colorCorrection") [[then]] { [[hint]] "alteration done !" };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Post process effects]], [[ppEffectForceInNVG]], [[ppEffectEnable]], [[ppEffectDestroy]], [[ppEffectCreate]], [[ppEffectCommit]], [[ppEffectAdjust]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
